entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
